EventBubbles.summary: The bubbles read-only property of the interface indicates whether the event bubbles up through the DOM tree or not.

blockquote.para: Note: See Event bubbling and capture for more information on bubbling.

remarks.para:
- to prevent further propagation of the current event in the capturing and bubbling phases
- to not call any further listeners for the same event at the same level in the DOM
- to allow propagation to continue but to disallow the browser to perform its default action should no listeners handle the event

EventBubbles.value: A boolean value, which is true if the event bubbles up through the DOM tree.
